allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add PyCAS library with CAS file reader and PyPI packaging

- Implement complete CAS file format parser for Atari 8-bit cassette files
- Add support for all chunk types (FUJI, baud, data, fsk, pwms, pwmc, pwmd, pwml)
- Add binary (.bin) file conversion functionality
- Add flexible hex/ASCII dump with chunk selection (ranges and lists)
- Create comprehensive CLI with argparse (dump, --to-bin, --info commands)
- Add PyPI packaging with setup.py, pyproject.toml, and MANIFEST.in
- Add comprehensive README.md with API documentation and examples
- Add MIT License
- Version 0.1.1

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
